name: Goldenheart
storyline: You have entered a foreign land in the course of an expedition and become unintentionally involved in an otherworldly mystery. Your party stops travel and sets up camp to find safety after encountering trouble on the road.
summary:
You have entered a foreign land in the course of an expedition and become unintentionally involved in an otherworldly mystery. Tuldenorrea is a deceptively simple world, balanced delicately between the extreme forces of a magical universe.

Goldenheart is a retro first person fantasy adventure game created by two people in our home studio. It has a look and feel inspired by our favorite classic console games.

You’ll master simple but dynamic combat using targeting, dodging, and a shield, while managing your quiver capacity and stamina. You’ll need to take time to explore and observe your surroundings in order to navigate the world and solve the puzzles.

You play as an outsider, learning the ancient lore of a foreign land as you solve a mystery that has recently befallen it. As you progress, you’ll find a few new tools that will augment the gameplay somewhat and lead you into more dangerous and anomalous places.

Goldenheart omits several features that have become commonplace in modern games. Our focus is on creating more of the classic gameplay that big companies have left behind, not on trying to create a modern RPG or a breakthrough feature. Adventurers ye be warned.
